Assumption: Main PSB building footprint is 18000 sf per PP-05
Cold storage building is 6000 sf (60x100 ft) per PP-07
Developed site area is 4.5 acres per PP-10
Main PSB split approximately 40% office/admin (7200 sf) and 60% apparatus/shop bays (10800 sf)
ImpactIfWrong: If split different; MEP and interior costs shift

Assumption: General requirements at 15% of base construction
Design fees at 9% blended rate of base construction
OI-004 resolved as $20000 FF&E cash allowance on Additional Option 6
ImpactIfWrong: If FF&E scope expanded; Schedule A structure changes

Assumption: GST rate is 5% (Alberta has no PST)
No escalation applied (base year 2024) per BOE A-08
Professional staff hourly rates reflect Alberta 2024 market rates
LOE hours (228h) appropriate for consolidated concept design package
Consolidated DEL-02-01 includes civil/site concept work from 6b split
ImpactIfWrong: Consolidation may create coordination overhead not fully captured

Assumption: No premium for schedule compression or overtime
ImpactIfWrong: Compressed timeline (PP-04: 6 weeks) could increase costs

Assumption: 80 hours adequate for consolidated design brief (5 SOW items)
No rework or iteration allowance included in 80 hours
ImpactIfWrong: If concept changes trigger rework; additional hours needed

Assumption: Bond types: standard Performance (50%) + L&M Payment (50%)
Source: Industry standard; RFP S5.3.1 not extracted
ImpactIfWrong: If 100% performance bond required; premiums could double

Assumption: CCIP is insurance delivery model (not OPIP)
ImpactIfWrong: If OPIP; CCIP $197260 would not apply

Assumption: Construction value ($9.863M) is PARAMETRIC and will change
ImpactIfWrong: All % premiums ($537534) scale with final value

Assumption: All professional hourly rates are internal DB rates (not external consultant fees)
Consolidated deliverables require multi-discipline coordination overhead
Base year 2024; no escalation applied
All 21 deliverables estimated regardless of evaluation weight
ImpactIfWrong: Low-weight items naturally have lower hours
